hero.title: Connect, Collaborate, Create.
hero.paragraph: Join study rooms, build projects, and compete in tournaments to learn, grow, and achieve more with students who share your passion.

features.title: Key Features
features.learn_desc: Join virtual study rooms to collaborate with peers, share resources, and tackle challenges together.
features.projects_desc: Build real world projects with fellow students and start a team
features.tournaments_desc: Participate in coding and developer tournaments to test your skills
